name: Slomo Dude Vs Zombies
description:
Just a dude on a mission to take down zombies in slomo to save the world (from zombies).

Download Instructions:

  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on Slomo Dude Vs Zombies.exe
  • Play a really bad game
